text:
Hello everyone! I am a final-year, CS and data science double-major undergraduate at HKUST. Nice to meet you all. I am looking forward to participating in jsoc!

I have some experience in projects and research in NLP (e.g. text generation based on BERT) and ML (e.g. fake news detection with a proposed GNN variant) (also 4 relevant courseworks, including Advanced AI (A+)). I've found some reletated projects that I'm interested in, so I am learning Julia!
